thread.title: Envision Bank Appoints Paul O’Reilly as VP/Residential Lending Manager

author: cnbc.com
title: Envision Bank Appoints Paul O’Reilly as VP/Residential Lending Manager
text:
STOUGHTON, Mass., March 28, 2018 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Envision Bank & Mortgage has appointed Paul O’Reilly as Vice President, Residential Lending Manager. His office will be based in Waltham, MA.
Paul O’Reilly is a seasoned veteran in the mortgage industry with over 31 years of hands on experience helping his customers achieve the dream of homeownership. He believes in focusing on the customer and ensuring they have all the guidance and information they need throughout the process whether it is their first home purchase or they are preparing to downsize and focus on retirement. O’Reilly builds life-long relationships with his customers and works with multiple generations within the families he has helped over the years. His breadth of experience includes first time home buyer programs, VA & FHA lending, second home loans, jumbo mortgage options and construction loans.
O’Reilly is also passionate about giving back to the communities he serves. He is an active member of the Rotary Club of Watertown, serves on the Board of Directors of the Stratford Foundation, and works with the Nashoba Learning Group, an organization dedicated to working with children and adults with Autism. He resides in Belmont with his wife, and two sons.
Given his extensive network, he works with clients throughout New England and is ready when you are to sit down and find the right loan for your unique needs. He can be reached at 617-719-9347.
About Envision Bank
Founded in 1851, Envision Bank is a Massachusetts-based community bank, committed to proactively helping consumers and business owners simplify their financial lives. It operates six full-service locations, three lending centers, and seven mortgage production offices in Massachusetts, Rhode Island, and southern New Hampshire and can serve anyone in New England online at www.envisionbank.com . The bank is a top regional mortgage lender, as well as a provider of cash management and financing solutions to commercial businesses. (NASDAQ:RNDB)
